name: Gerardo Saporosi
description:
Gerardo Saporosi (SirGerardThe1st)
Electronic Engineer
Crypto strategist since prehistory (2009)
Blogger and podcaster passionate about crypto and DeFi
DApps Developer
All opinions are my own and in no way constitute financial advice or are intended to replace your own research.
